Our organisation

Rescue Dogs is dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating dogs in need. Our mission is to provide a safe haven for abandoned, neglected, and abused dogs, offering them a chance for a better life. Through fostering, medical care, and adoption programs, we work to find loving, forever homes for every dog that comes into our care. With a focus on compassion, education, and community involvement, we strive to create a world where every dog is treated with kindness and respect.Our mission started with our dog 4 years ago. Our passion is increasing from day to day. We took care over 50+ the most riskiest cases.Our goal is to make better place to the ones who makes our days better.


With love, Gerry and Naomi
